ygData.subject: Re: Quest Help(riverdale)
ygData.msgSnippet: well i have a question i want to know about this midnight hammer does anyone out there know anything about it and oh yah i killed trumpy and got the hammer
ygData.messageBody:
well i have a question i want to know about this midnight hammer does anyone
out there know anything about it



and oh yah i killed trumpy and got the hammer mannnn it took me such a long
time to get it,,,,travel time kinda sucked but it was worth the trip
----- Original Message -----
From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, February 01, 1999 11:21 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Quest Help(riverdale)


> From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
>
> dlobdell wrote:
> >
> > From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>
> >
> > Just a side note on that: the ring can be recharged at any cleric
guild.. I've recharged it in Ak'anon and Freeport before.. But i do agree,
the ring isnt very useful, not as good as it was in beta anyway.
> >
>
> Well.. I wouldn't say anywhere. I tried to get it recharged in
> Felwithe and I lost it. But.. since the quest is faction based once i
> got back to vale i got aonther ring. I don't feel like trying any other
> towns.
